title: Science Academic English Competency Enhancement Program in Technology-Mediated Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Academic English and Practical Experience in the Scientific Field
context.additional_context: A blended/flipped learning environment for in-service professionals to integrate workplace learning

learning_goals: Learners can independently analyze one academic paper in the field of science in a technology-mediated environment
Learners can produce academic presentation materials in English through blended learning-based collaborative assignments
Learners can correct over 80% of academic writing errors using an AI feedback system provided in a flipped learning format
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
